data.message: Some of yall dont understand Eminem dont want no beef with any rappers he lost his best friend because of beef with other rappers. Times have changed u cant rhyme and earn each others respect. If u dont believe me then listen to Eminems toy soldier song it explains it all

replies.message: I agree. He does what he does only by heart 💗💗💗

Patrick, he lost proof not because he had beef with other rappers. Proof got into an altercation/fight in a club in detroit with his former schoolmate and proof got shot. Rest in peace Proof. Rest in peace Bugz.
Tf Drake gone do? He don't got shooters 😂
No men.drake just give a respect to em because he know the real rapper come from detroit. I think he will not do so.
Proof was in the music video for like toy soldiers a year before he died over a poker game.

What poker game jacob? He was at the club and he had an altercation with his former schoolmate over a billiards game with some girls involved. XXL even made this a public info 10 years ago. The manager of the club tried to fabricate what really happened.

Chris Croze makes the crowd go crazy at the shelter where Eminem did 8 mile
